WEIGHT CATEGORY BMI (kg/m2) RANGE OF TOTAL 
GWG (kg)

Source: Rasmussen & Yaktine [97, p.2].
One country reported using the earlier IoM recommendations from 1990 [207], while the remainder did not 
specify any source for their recommendations.
